title: Bug 7581: ComboBoxCellEditor does not size correctly in property sheet
description: From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com wrote in message news:3C407F76.31A82113@us.ibm.com...
OB: The combo box does not size correctly in the property sheet column.
EB: I would have expected the combo box to always be the same width as the property sheet column. It should work the same as the DialogCellEditor, where the button is always visible.
SR:
To reproduce the bug:
1. Open the property sheet.
2. Edit a cell that uses the ComboBoxCellEditor.
3. Observe that the combo box does not size correctly.
